test.description: Bengali Probhat - r`/Z - Testing RA-YAPHALA with ZWJ
Cyrillic small д is is unchanged
Cyrillic small ш is is unchanged
Extended Cyrillic small ш becomes palochka
Cyrillic capital Ш is is unchanged
Extended Cyrillic capital Ш becomes palochka
Georgian jim morisoni with Wiki Signature
